## \_deleteModel() function

Responsible for deleting model with given id(s) and children with cascadeDelete set to true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _deleteModel<TState, TModel extends StateModels<TState>>(state: Immutable<TState>, stateProp: Immutable<StatePropByModel<TState, TModel>>, cfg: {
    id?: string | number;
    ids?: Immutable<string[] | number[]>;
}): Immutable<Partial<TState>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | Immutable&lt;TState&gt; | The state containing model &amp; child state. |
|  stateProp | Immutable&lt;[StatePropByModel](./model-core.statepropbymodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState, TModel&gt;&gt; | The state property of the model thats being deleted. |
|  cfg | { id?: string \| number; ids?: Immutable&lt;string\[\] \| number\[\]&gt;; } | The id or ids of the model(s) to be deleted. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TState&gt;&gt;

Updated state with deletion applied.
